name: Match 3 Diamond Crush FREE
description:
Match 3 Diamond Crush with spectacular graphics and exciting new gameplay. Extremely attractive to view diamond monumental explosion. You will not be disappointed
HOW TO PLAY?
- Move the adjacent diamonds to form a horizontal or vertical
- Every time you blow up the rocks you will get bonus scores and hints to play better

CHALLENGES
Defrosting
You will break the ice boxs with the number of moves is limited.
There are two forms of ice: snow and ice. Need 2 times breaking to break the snow item; and the ice item just needs once.
The game will be more dramatic when the higher level.
